level.introtext: Here's another tool to learn: Use the RENAMER to change variable names.
level.endtext: Great! You've acquired a new tool!
level.code: @We're back with a new tool!@ Use the Renamer tool on purple variable names to change them. @We can change the name of variables to accurately describe data.@ ??? !!! i = 0; @A single letter doesn't tell us much, but maybe we can use it to count and call it counter.@ ??? !!! Look at the code to get context clues about the variable's purpose. @Context is important!
